casebody.data:
Arthur E. WALRADT, as Trustee, etc., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Herman BERKOVITZ and Simon Spiegel, Individually, etc., Defendants-Appellants. SAME, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Morris ROSENBERG and Alexander Katz, Individually, etc., Defendants-Appellants. Nos. 257, 258. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 14, 1930. David Steckler, of New York City (Edmund B. Hennefeld, of New York City, on the brief), for appellants. David Haar, of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decrees affirmed in open court.
